Indian Economy.title: IMF ups India’s GDP forecast for FY26, FY27
Indian Economy.summary: IMF raises India's growth forecast amidst tariff uncertainty, projecting 6.4% growth for FY2025-26 and FY2026-27.

Indian Economy.title: P&G succession: Let’s applaud the Indian diaspora’s success but also look within
Indian Economy.summary: Shailesh Jejurikar, an executive of Indian origin, is set to reach the top of P&G. This is good news, not ‘brain drain’, but comes amid a trend of outmigration that provokes a few hard questions about India’s economic dynamism.

Indian Economy.title: RBI’s message is clear: Corporate houses shouldn’t expect banking licences
Indian Economy.summary: RBI Governor Sanjay Malhotra has done well to reiterate the central bank’s long-held policy of keeping corporate houses out of banking. It is best to avoid conflicts of interest in this vital sector and the counter-argument isn’t persuasive.

Indian Economy.title: Mint Quick Edit | India’s industrial weakness mustn’t persist
Indian Economy.summary: The index of industrial production put up a weak show in June, though a few segments outperformed the rest. What we need, of course, is a long awaited factory boom.

Indian Economy.title: India's construction boom will require better risk management: Marsh report
Indian Economy.summary: The construction industry is expected to grow by 7.1% in 2025, one of the fastest rates in the IMEA region, but this will require better risk and insurance strategies, the global insurance broker and risk advisor said.

Stock Market.summary: Nifty Bank index outlook: Vulnerable to break crucial support at 55,900, resistance at 56,200, trade strategy included.

Stock Market.title: Sensex, Nifty likely to open on a subdued note; trade deal, earnings in focus
Stock Market.summary: Gift Nifty futures were trading at 24,665 points this morning, indicating that the Nifty 50 will open near Monday's close of 24,680.9

Stock Market.title: Sensex, Nifty post marginal gains amid mixed trading session
Stock Market.summary: Markets displayed modest recovery in afternoon trading on Tuesday, with both benchmark indices managing to reverse morning losses and move into positive territory despite persistent foreign institutional investor outflows and ongoing trade uncertainty.

Startups & Funding.title: Sharpsell.ai secures ₹30 crore Series A led by Equentis Angel Fund
Startups & Funding.summary: The Mumbai-based startup, founded in 2022 by Hanuman Kamma and Arun Subramanian, operates a sales playbook automation platform serving over 100,000 sales representatives across 30 Indian companies

Startups & Funding.title: Eternal in hypergrowth phase: Headcount doubles on expansion drive
Startups & Funding.summary: Eternal (formerly Zomato) more than doubled its workforce in FY25 but this headcount surge has come with falling average salaries, and soaring boardroom compensation.

Startups & Funding.title: Singapore ready to rejoin Amaravati project, rekindles ties with Andhra Pradesh
Startups & Funding.summary: Singapore reaffirms support for Amaravati and Andhra Pradesh development after Naidu visit; eyes investment in agriculture, energy, ports, and tech.

Startups & Funding.summary: They’re supposedly antibiotic-free, cage-free, cruelty-free and chemical-free. But at  ₹25 apiece, you’ll spend more on one of these eggs than on a kg of onions. And yet, investors are willing to back companies selling branded eggs. Mint cracked a few to get …

Startups & Funding.title: Singapore's GIC sees AI opportunity for India as "raw ingredients" are in place
Startups & Funding.summary: Singapore GIC’s CIO Bryan Yeo calls AI “foundational” to its long-term strategy, with India emerging as a key focus. Backed by strong tech talent and rising digitization, GIC is investing across AI adopters and scaling Indian startups through its global Bridg…

Banking & Finance.title: RBI Dy Guv flags creative accounting, liberal interpretations of regulations by some bank, NBFC managements
Banking & Finance.summary: rbi Deputy Governor warns of unethical practices in banking, emphasizes need for ethical growth strategies and effective resource management.

Banking & Finance.title: RBI’s message is clear: Corporate houses shouldn’t expect banking licences
Banking & Finance.summary: RBI Governor Sanjay Malhotra has done well to reiterate the central bank’s long-held policy of keeping corporate houses out of banking. It is best to avoid conflicts of interest in this vital sector and the counter-argument isn’t persuasive.

Banking & Finance.title: Zepto raises ₹7.5 crore from Elcid Investments, doubles revenue
Banking & Finance.summary: The NBFC had invested in Zepto late last year as well, and following the latest share purchase it will hold 0.039% stake in company

Banking & Finance.title: RBI caps AIF investments by banks and non-banks at 10% of fund's corpus
Banking & Finance.summary: The central bank also said the collective contribution of all such entities in any AIF should not cross 20% of the corpus.

Banking & Finance.title: RBI eases lenders’ investment norms in AIF schemes
Banking & Finance.summary: RBI relaxes norms on lenders' investments in AIF schemes, allowing up to 20% corpus investment, strengthening internal mechanisms required.

Technology Sector.title: Indian IT firms need to revisit the way they upskill talent, say analysts
Technology Sector.summary: Indian IT companies upskill employees, but struggle with redeployment due to skills gap, especially for mid-level talent.

Technology Sector.title: How you can use these spending-linked deductions to save taxes
Technology Sector.summary: Tax-payers opting for old tax regime can claim deduction on education expenses such as tuition fees, preventive health check-up, etc. Certain spending attracts TCS, which can be claimed regardless of old or new tax regime.

Technology Sector.title: Mint Explainer | TCS layoffs, slowdowns, and AI disruption: Why IT jobs are vanishing
Technology Sector.summary: Legacy roles are fading, AI is rising, and hiring is stalling—India’s IT services industry is entering a turbulent new phase.

Technology Sector.title: Behind the layoffs at TCS that could affect 12,000 jobs
Technology Sector.summary: TCS will let go more people in the coming months, as it expects to complete this layoff exercise by the end of this year.

Technology Sector.title: P&G succession: Let’s applaud the Indian diaspora’s success but also look within
Technology Sector.summary: Shailesh Jejurikar, an executive of Indian origin, is set to reach the top of P&G. This is good news, not ‘brain drain’, but comes amid a trend of outmigration that provokes a few hard questions about India’s economic dynamism.
